text: Area code 727 is a telephone area code in the state of Florida, United States. It was created on July 1, 1998, when it was split from area code 813. It covers the Pinellas County and parts of Pasco County in Florida. Some of the major cities and towns in this area code include St. Petersburg, Clearwater, Largo, Palm Harbor, Pinellas Park, and Tarpon Springs. 727
title: Area code 727
